mapper.select: SELECT sms_template_id FROM yard_sms_template_relation WHERE yard_id = #{yardId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY is_default DESC, gmt_create ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE yard_sms_template_relation SET deleted = 1, gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE yard_id = #{yardId} AND deleted = 0
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO yard_sms_template_relation (yard_id, sms_template_id, template_usage, is_default, deleted, gmt_create) VALUES
(#{item.yardId}, #{item.smsTemplateId}, #{item.templateUsage}, #{item.isDefault}, 0, NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE template_usage = VALUES(template_usage), is_default = VALUES(is_default), deleted = 0, gmt_modified = NOW()
